chinese: 瞻彼旱麓、榛楛濟濟。豈弟君子、于祿豈弟。
english: Look at the foot of the Han,How abundantly grow the hazel and the arrow-thorn!Easy and self-possessed was our prince,In his pursuit of dignity [still] easy and self-possessed!

chinese: 瑟彼玉瓚、黃流在中。其弟君子、福祿攸降。
english: Massive is that libation-cup of jade,With the yellow liquid [sparkling] in it.Easy and self-possessed was our prince,The fit recipient of blessing and dignity.

chinese: 鳶飛戾天、魚躍于淵。豈弟君子、遐不作人。
english: The hawk flies up to heaven;The fishes leap in the deep.Easy and self-possessed was our-prince; -Did he not exert an influence upon men?

chinese: 清酒既載、騂牡既備。以享以祀、以介景福。
english: His clear spirits are in vessel;His red bull is ready; -To offer, to sacrifice,To increase his bright happiness.

chinese: 瑟彼柞棫、民所燎矣。豈弟君子、神所勞矣。
english: Thick grow the oaks and the yu,Which the people use for fuel.Easy and self-possessed was our prince,Cheered and encouraged by the Spirits.

chinese: 莫莫葛藟、施于條枚。豈弟君子、求福不回。
english: Luxuriant are the dolichos and other creepers,Clinging to the branches and stems,Easy and self-possessed was our prince,Seeking for happiness by no crooked ways.
